text: Boys is a 1996 American romantic mystery drama movie directed by Stacy Cochran and was based on the short story Twenty Minutes by James Salter. It stars Winona Ryder, Lukas Haas, John C. Reilly, James LeGros, Skeet Ulrich, Matt Malloy, Chris Cooper, Bill Sage and was distributed by Touchstone Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1996 mystery movies Category:1996 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies set in Baltimore Category:Movies set in boarding schools
title: Boys (1996 movie)
